overview:
Gillian ONeil - co-founder 29studios.com

I am currently focussing on Strategy & Development of my other start-up 29studios.com who launched in February 2009 to provide cutting edge visual communication strategies for many international companies.

Previously CEO & co-founder of Moviecom.tv an online video platform for the business community, Moviecom.tv is based in Scotland, UK.

As a serial entrepreneur I have gained a raft of experiences over the past 15 year in the creative media and technology sector. Video is at the heart of what we do and with the global trends clearly demonstrating that online video is the fasted growing medium in the history of the world.

I was invited to present in Los Angeles, US at the Red Herring 2011 finals and Won for one of my start-ups Moviecom.tv a prestigious Global 100 Red Herring Award, an award that many previous winners included global successes such as Google, Facebook, Salesforce, Twitter. I then developed strategic partnerships for Moviecom.tv where in April 2012 Moviecom.tv became a developer partner to YouTube with the intergration of YouTube API’s. Together with my other co-founder Kev O’Neil we were invited to present the Moviecom.tv technology stack at the annual Google I/O 2012 conference in San Francisco in June 2012.
